about.p1: I am a Frontend Developer with experience building websites and web applications. I specialize in the design, and have experience working with React.
about.p2: I also seek to improve my skills and continue to grow professionally in order to add value to any work group. And I love exploring opportunities, as well as participating in projects even without having much experience.
